trans-unit.source: Represents an activity-based callback.
trans-unit.target: 表示活動為基礎的回呼。

trans-unit.source: Activity delegates enable activity authors to expose callbacks with specific signatures that users of the activity can provide activity-based handlers for.
trans-unit.target: 活動委派可讓活動作者使用特定的簽章以公開回呼，活動使用者可提供以活動為基礎的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: There are two types of activity delegates: <xref:System.Activities.ActivityAction%601> is used for invoking activities that do not have a return value, and <xref:System.Activities.ActivityFunc%601> is used for invoking activities that do have a return value.
trans-unit.target: 活動委派的兩種類型︰<xref:System.Activities.ActivityAction%601>用於叫用沒有傳回值的活動和<xref:System.Activities.ActivityFunc%601>用於叫用沒有傳回值的活動。</xref:System.Activities.ActivityFunc%601> </xref:System.Activities.ActivityAction%601>

trans-unit.source: Activity delegates are useful in scenarios where a child activity must be constrained to having a certain signature.
trans-unit.target: 活動委派非常實用，讓簽章必須限制子活動的案例中。

trans-unit.source: Called by derived class constructors to initialize the object.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫以初始化物件的衍生的類別建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an optional friendly name that is used for debugging, validation, exception handling, and tracking.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定選用的易記名稱會用於偵錯、 驗證、 例外狀況處理及追蹤。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀，在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在執行階段設定值<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>就會擲回。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: A friendly name that is used for debugging, validation, exception handling, and tracking.
trans-unit.target: 易記名稱會用於偵錯、 驗證、 例外狀況處理及追蹤。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, returns the <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateOutArgument"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，會傳回<xref href="System.Activities.DelegateOutArgument"></xref>的<xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An out argument for the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Out 引數<xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is represented by this <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所表示的活動<xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀，在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在執行階段設定值<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>就會擲回。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The activity that is represented by this <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這由活動<xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Supplies a list of runtime arguments for the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供的執行階段引數清單<xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, this method can be used to customize the arguments that are used by the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，這個方法可用於自訂<xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>.</xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>所使用的引數

trans-unit.source: The list to be populated with runtime arguments.
trans-unit.target: 要填入執行階段引數清單。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*> property value should be serialized to XAML.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否<xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*>屬性值應該序列化為 XAML。</xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*>

trans-unit.source: ShouldSerializeDisplayName returns `true` if the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName%2A> was explicitly set on the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 ShouldSerializeDisplayName`true`如果<xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName%2A>已明確設定於<xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>。</xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate> </xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*>屬性值應該序列化，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> representation of the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref> that contains the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.String>表示<xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>包含<xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*>.</xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A representation of the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref> that contains the <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*>.
trans-unit.target: 表示法<xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>包含<xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*>.</xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate.DisplayName*>
